itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper and Zinc together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Melted Copper Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper Ore.

item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Zinc Ore.

item.name: Altinova Ferry Cargo Container
item.desc:
A Mediah freight chest that can be attached to a ferry. It allows the boat to hold heavier cargo when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +3%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Ferry
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Wagon Registration: Noble Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Noble Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 20, Acceleration: 95%, Speed: 95%, Turn: 95%, Braking: 95%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Merchant Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Merchant Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 18, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Trade Wagon
item.desc:

- Inventory Slot(s): 16, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License

 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.

 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 Brass Ingots.

A cover for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Combat Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Durable heavy saddle made of hard leather that is purpose built for battle.
Increases stability for faster riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Light Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Sturdier and lighter saddle made of high-quality leather
Increases stability for faster riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Ship License: Mediah Ferry
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Mediah Ferry> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 8, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
